title.text: COVID-19 Cases by the 15th of Oct

transform.expr: isValid(datum["TotalRecovered"]) && isFinite(+datum["TotalRecovered"]) && isValid(datum["TotalDeaths"]) && isFinite(+datum["TotalDeaths"]) && isValid(datum["TotalPopulation"]) && isFinite(+datum["TotalPopulation"])

tooltip.signal: {"Country/Region": isValid(datum["Country/Region"]) ? datum["Country/Region"] : ""+datum["Country/Region"], "TotalConfirmed": format(datum["TotalConfirmed"], ","), "TotalDeaths": format(datum["TotalDeaths"], ","), "TotalRecovered": format(datum["TotalRecovered"], ","), "TotalPopulation": format(datum["TotalPopulation"], ","), "Cases per 10,000 Population": format(datum["Cases per 10,000 Population"], ".2f")}

description.signal: "Recovered Cases: " + (format(datum["TotalRecovered"], "")) + "; Num. of Deaths: " + (format(datum["TotalDeaths"], "")) + "; TotalPopulation: " + (format(datum["TotalPopulation"], ".1s")) + "; Country/Region: " + (isValid(datum["Country/Region"]) ? datum["Country/Region"] : ""+datum["Country/Region"]) + "; TotalConfirmed: " + (format(datum["TotalConfirmed"], ",")) + "; TotalDeaths: " + (format(datum["TotalDeaths"], ",")) + "; TotalRecovered: " + (format(datum["TotalRecovered"], ",")) + "; Cases per 10,000 Population: " + (format(datum["Cases per 10,000 Population"], ".2f"))

opacity.test: datum['Country/Region'] == 'India' || datum['Country/Region'] == 'Singapore' || datum['Country'] == 'Australia' || datum['Country/Region'] == 'Tanzania' || datum['Country/Region'] == 'Greece' || datum['Country/Region'] == 'Belgium' || datum['Country/Region'] == 'United States of America'

tooltip.signal: {"Country/Region": isValid(datum["Country/Region"]) ? datum["Country/Region"] : ""+datum["Country/Region"], "TotalConfirmed": format(datum["TotalConfirmed"], ","), "TotalDeaths": format(datum["TotalDeaths"], ","), "TotalRecovered": format(datum["TotalRecovered"], ","), "TotalPopulation": format(datum["TotalPopulation"], ","), "Cases per 10,000 Population": format(datum["Cases per 10,000 Population"], ".2f")}

description.signal: "Recovered Cases: " + (format(datum["TotalRecovered"], "")) + "; Num. of Deaths: " + (format(datum["TotalDeaths"], "")) + "; Country/Region: " + (isValid(datum["Country/Region"]) ? datum["Country/Region"] : ""+datum["Country/Region"]) + "; TotalConfirmed: " + (format(datum["TotalConfirmed"], ",")) + "; TotalDeaths: " + (format(datum["TotalDeaths"], ",")) + "; TotalRecovered: " + (format(datum["TotalRecovered"], ",")) + "; TotalPopulation: " + (format(datum["TotalPopulation"], ",")) + "; Cases per 10,000 Population: " + (format(datum["Cases per 10,000 Population"], ".2f"))
